mapper.insert: insert into readerinfo (num, name, college, major_class) values (#{num},#{name},#{college},#{major_class})
mapper.select: select * from readerinfo order by num
select * from readerinfo order by college
select name from readerinfo where num = #{num}
mapper.delete: delete from readerinfo where num = #{num} and name = #{name}
mapper.update: update readerinfo set college = #{college}, major_class = #{major_class} where num = #{num} and name = #{name}
